description: This notification is generated when a supplicant authentication event
as identified by the value of cienaCes8021xNotificationAuthenticationEvent
has occurred on the port identified by cienaCes8021xPort.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xSuppAuthenticationEvent CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xPort u 9999 CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xNotificationAuthenticationEvent i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Pgid of the port
variables.name: CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xPort

description: This object identifies the type of authentication event being communicated
in the notification in which this object is located.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xNotificationAuthenticationEvent

description: This notification is generated when a authenticator authentication event
as identified by the value of cienaCes8021xNotificationAuthenticationEvent
has occurred on the port identified by cienaCes8021xPort.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xAuthAuthenticationEvent CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xPort u 9999 CIENA-CES-8021X-MIB::cienaCes8021xNotificationAuthenticationEvent i 1

description: This notification is generated when a configuration change is made
in a dot1x authentication port.

in a dot1x supplicant port.
